name: Cut the Strings
description:
Don't cut the WRONG string!

Cut the RED string and you will lose!

Cut the WHITE string to gain a score!

Controls

  • Mouse LMB (Hold) to cut a string

Credits

  • 'Thorn n Ropes' by Wyver9 (https://opengameart.org/content/arcade-level-tracks-8-bitchiptune)
  • SFXr
